lore: Sigmund spent most of his life in Eternity's End, observing and studying the flow of time. Faced with the coming chaos, Vertraag helped him to protect Rodia, or so the God of Time made him believe.\n\nWhen newborns are orphaned, their primal sadness makes this creature appear. It takes care of the baby, but never lets them age, instead channeling that temporal energy to wear down its enemies' health.
menagerieDialog: (Its baby is crying, but it doesn't seem to care.)
(You can't help but wonder whose baby it's holding. On second thought, you'd rather not know.)
(Its baby begins to cry. It must not like you very much.)
(The baby is screaming for its mother.)
(This is, without a doubt, one of the most disturbing creatures in the world. Personally, you can't imagine ever settling down to have children yourself.)
name: Nightveil Spectre
